title: What Lies Beneath
itunes:title: What Lies Beneath

description:
There's something in the water...

***

Written by IrrefutablyWhy and narrated by Danielle Hewitt

***

See how you can get rewarded by supporting the show at Patreon.com/Creepypod

You can also subscribe to us on YouTube:

https://www.youtube.com/creepypod

***

Produced by Steve Blizin, Puzzle Audio

***

Title music by Alex Aldea

***

Artwork by Dakota Miller *** Intro/outro narration by Joe Stofko


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
